g.text: 1.2 DFSP1 sends a Prepare Transfer request to DFSP2 - Prepare Validation Failure
Routes & Publishes Prepare event for DFSP1
Ensures that event is replicated as configured (ACKS=all)
Responds replication acknoledgements have been received
Consumes Prepare event message for DFSP1
Requests Notification details for DFSP1 - GET - HTTP://notifications/DFPS1
HTTP Callback with Prepare result to DFSP1
